body:
# A terrible journey into static site generation...

So I want to start with, this is NOT how one should go into a project and design things. I can hardly say I designed anything. It was more akin to walking around in a dark room bumping into walls and finding random objects to get where I wanted to go - which I also didn't really know either? 

I built this site for no other reason than to just tinker with tech. It's been a long time since I sat down and "wrote" code for no real purpose, which is probably why I'm still doing it. 

BUILD STUPID STUFF!
title: Build Stupid Stuff!
